Description: On VA-10 in the County of Chesterfield, in the vicinity of Tucker Rd; Rt. 774E/W (Chesterfield County), motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. All east lanes are closed. All west lanes are closed.

Description: On I-664 in the City of Suffolk, at Monitor Merrimac Memorial Bridge Tunnel North, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The north right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On US-60 East in the County of Powhatan, in the vicinity of Rocky Oak Rd; Rt. 678E/W (Powhatan County), motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash.
